name: Junimo Catch!
description:
Junimo Catch! - Collect the fruits -

Junimo-Catch is a fanmade, Stardew Valley inspired game. It's a little passion project of mine. 

A big Thank You to FEIDRY for doing the programming! He is a great guy. 

It's very simple. The player is a Junimo, a forest ghost that looks like an apple. I like them a lot. In Stardew Valley, they harvest your crops every morning, so I had the idea of making them collect raining fruits! Each fruit gives a different amount of points. That's it!

Hope you like it!

You can buy Stardew Valley on Steam.
